Hi everybody!

I noticed a strange, pretty short scroll-backtoTop-"stutter" everytime i click a link. so the entire text jumps for half a second before the (unfortunately not really smooth) scrolling starts...... is this normal/expected? or maybe a hardware/quest setup issue? 

there also seems to be an issue with the auto scrolling... when you use the function "use on" (for example "use key on lock"), after you clicked "lock" in the list menu, the text doesn't scroll down, so the input box vanishes (until you scroll down manually of course, but its weird for people not used to it)

is there anything i can do to improve or solve these issues?
thanks!

  --stephan
